channel.title: The way the scientist says "...climb up and start the rotors..."
channel.description:
It sounds so similar to the original, it almost seems like a carbon copy. If you don't know what I'm talking about, it's the tidbit where you first step into the test chamber where things are about to fudge up, a scientist with a deeper voice says "If you would be so good as to climb up and start the rotors..." continued by the rest of the dialogue.
The particular part where he says the word "rotors" sounds pretty much exactly the same as the original HL where the scientist also says it, or at least to me, it does.

item.title: The way the scientist says "...climb up and start the rotors..."

item.description:
